Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: Cant be certain, but I suspect that there could be situations where makerbots update order prices, but taker's orderbook has not yet been updated resulting in an attempt to match with an order which has since been cancelled by the maker. If so, the more frequently a makerbot updates prices, the more often this could happen.

Author: ca333#0118
Content: @Seko thank you for the informations - we are investigating your reported issue - please try again with only a few coins active - i.e. launch the app and only activate 2-3 coins and see what happens. We are aware of this issue - seems an iOS limitation on concurrent (network) threads or similar where if you activate all/many coins that it will lead to DEX unresponsiveness. We will isolate and fix this shortly.

Content: Segwitadresses actually not supported

Author: jorian#4555

Author: ca333#0118
Content: its not supported yet as DEX doesn't differentiate between legacy p2sh addresses and p2sh-p2wpkh addresses (segwit) which both start with `3` - coming soon
